semantic_identifier: [GOLD-157]: Show Jira/Linear two-way sync status + last synced details on Issue page
title: Show Jira/Linear two-way sync status + last synced details on Issue page

sections.text: Add a sync status panel on the Issue_Tracker issue object when a Jira/Linear issue is linked, showing external key/link, current sync state (healthy/error), and last_synced_at + last_external_updated_at. Surface actionable error messaging (e.g., missing permissions, issue not found) and provide a “Refresh from Jira/Linear” / “Push update” manual re-sync action that calls the existing sync endpoints. This reduces the perceived “link-only” workflow by making two-way sync visible and self-serve.
